title: Сны
overview: A mystical detective with Pavel Priluchny and Lisa Moryak about a girl with a frightening gift - in her dreams she sees how people die. Zhenya helps solve crimes thanks to her incredible ability: she has visionary dreams in places where someone has died. Captain Makarov, who attracted her to work in the police, believes that this is a great gift, but the girl considers her ability to be a curse. The wife will have to understand herself and understand that her whole life is not what it seems.
